Articles.Content:
Eurofighter Typhoon

-2 variants: stock and BD armory

-160 parts on stock and 200 on modded

Javascript is disabled. View full album

stock photo

DOWNLOAD MOD PLANE (requires only BD armory)

DOWNLOAD STOCK PLANE

REMEMBER TO REP ME AND/OR LEAVE A COMMENT IF YOU LIKE MY CREATIONS
This looks really nice and really accurate. I'll give you rep next time I can
I cannot give you rep again yet, but great work!

I cannot give you rep again yet, but great work!

Comments are really apreciated too =)
Another fantastic Eorins replica! Same here I can't rep again.
Ah, I didn't have to wait long! Well done indeed!

Looks great! Only thing I noticed is the shimmer on the wings, from overlapping parts. If you use offset, you can move one of the wings just the tiniest amount up or down and the shimmer will go away.

Comments are really apreciated too =)

You inspired me to design my own eurofighter. It's not as good as yours, but I'm getting better and learning from your designs. Thank you for sharing them!

You inspired me to design my own eurofighter. It's not as good as yours, but I'm getting better and learning from your designs. Thank you for sharing them!

Hey np man =) i'm happy that my crafts are usefull for someone ^^

little tip: watch my Yf-12A for an inside skelethon design wich increase rigidity

Hey np man =) i'm happy that my crafts are usefull for someone ^^

little tip: watch my Yf-12A for an inside skelethon design wich increase rigidity

I suspect that a lot of people enjoy your designs. Unfortunately, for some reason people who visit this subforum rarely comment in threads.

Thank you for the suggestion, I will watch your video.
